name: StopForumSpam
author: Marc-Andre Doll, STARC by EXAPROBE

configurationItems.name: suspicious_confidence_level
configurationItems.description: Confidence threshold above which the artifact should be marked as suspicious

configurationItems.name: malicious_confidence_level
configurationItems.description: Confidence threshold above which the artifact should be marked as malicious

description: Query http://www.stopforumspam.com to check if an IP or email address is a known spammer.
